architecture.routing: File-based routing using Next.js App Router

apiRoutes.purpose: Proxy server to stream video downloads and avoid CORS issues

capabilities: Download Instagram Reels in HD quality
Works on all devices (mobile, tablet, desktop)
workflow: User pastes Instagram URL in input field
System validates URL format (must start with http:// or https://)
API request sent to RapidAPI Instagram downloader service
Response contains video metadata (URL, thumbnail, quality, type)
Video streams through Next.js proxy API to avoid CORS
Video downloads to user's device as 'video.mp4'

downloadProcess: 1. User enters Instagram URL in InputSection component
2. URL validation checks for http:// or https:// prefix
3. InputSection makes GET request to RapidAPI with encoded URL
4. RapidAPI returns JSON with media array containing: {url, thumbnail, quality, type}
5. UserInput component receives response and updates urlResult state
6. ResultSection displays thumbnail and download button
9. Next.js API route fetches video and streams it back
